title: [1.10.X]Elemental Ghasts 更多恶魂———— 更多的BOSS
author: ﹡滑稽﹡
txt_content: Troll Ghast 这个恶混我喜欢

replies.author: 青木源
replies.txt_content:
标题: [1.10.X]Elemental Ghasts 更多恶魂———— 更多的BOSS 本帖最后由 XIAOMM 于 2016-9-1 20:46 编辑 

 介绍
This mod adds 5 cool,fatal,funny and friendly ghasts. All of the pictures will describe the ghasts. It took me a while to make these ghasts, especially the sound for the troll ghast so I hope you enjoy this mod. P.S the Troll ghast makes the troll noise :)

这个模组添加了5种不同的恶魂，见下图，这些恶魂的声音也有所不同
 图片

国内碗盘已汉化

 THE END
